signals.problem_statement: The customer finds Zendesk clunky and hard to set up desired workflows.
signals.customer_ask: Looking for a platform that is easy to use and set up workflows.
signals.context: Customer support team of five people, evaluating alternatives to Zendesk.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a platform that integrates support emails without using a shared inbox.
signals.customer_ask: Wants everything to be on one platform instead of using Gmail with a shared inbox.
signals.context: Customer support team of five people, evaluating alternatives to Zendesk.

signals.problem_statement: The customer requires HIPAA compliance and SOC 2 Type 2 certification for handling sensitive data.
signals.customer_ask: Confirms the need for HIPAA compliance and SOC 2 Type 2 certification.
signals.context: Customer support team of five people, working with hospitals and clinics.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is looking for a chat feature as they currently do not have one.
signals.customer_ask: Wants a platform that includes chat functionality.
signals.context: Customer support team of five people, currently using Zendesk without chat.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is concerned about the cost of the proposed solution compared to their current tools.
signals.customer_ask: Wants to understand pricing and what is included in the package.
signals.context: Customer support team of five people, evaluating alternatives to Zendesk.
